title: Lifesigns: Tapping the Power Synchronicity, Serendipity and Miracles
description: There is a power within and when we tap it life becomes magical!This book teaches you how to recognize, interpret and benefit from spiritual signs. Lifesigns are messages sent to us from the Universe to help live happier, more successful and fulfilling lives. Discover a practical five-step method which taps this inner guidance system. You will:•	Explore soul’s purpose •	Enhance creativity•	Engage intuition•	Energize lifeWhen Alex Marcoux began writing suspense novels, she discovered a fresh and innovative way to enhance her creativity and imagination. She used this process to gain guidance for her novels then applied it in her own life. The former scientist studied the phenomena for over ten years, she’s interviewed others with similar experiences and created the Lifesign Process, five steps to gain messages from your higher power.
author: Alex Marcoux
